articles.content: We've come across quite a few of Intel's Tiger Lake-H CPUs in the past few weeks. It showed up alongside the Intel NUC 11 Extreme and a rugged workstation. The mobile processors aren't due to arrive … [+2463 chars]

articles.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 in for review - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The next Samsung event is scheduled for April 14 and will give us new Galaxy Book laptops.
articles.content: The Redmi Note 10 did not win over the voters in our weekly poll, its siblings proved quite a bit more popular. That said, plenty of people are closely following the phone as evident by our trending … [+3432 chars]

articles.author: Anam Hamid
articles.title: Weak iPhone 12 mini sales aren't just bad news for Apple - PhoneArena
articles.description: Samsung's OLED panel shipment declined month-on-month in January because of the handset. The South Korean giant has penalized Apple in the past for missing purchase targets.
